markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tengu Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=1313) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 26 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You learned skills for surviving in the place where your people were dispersed. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) and [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in [Tengu Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8).
name: Tengu Lore
